meanings.definition: A person who adheres to a particular style or manner in their behavior or art.
meanings.sent1: The art class had a talented mannerist who always painted in a unique style.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a mannerist because of her distinct way of speaking and dressing.
meanings.sent3: The mannerist artist decided to paint using only shades of blue, creating a calming effect.
meanings.sent4: Being a mannerist in his approach to cooking, he always added a touch of spice to every dish.
meanings.sent5: The young mannerist sculptor carefully carved each piece with intricate details.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a particular style or manner, especially in art or architecture.
meanings.sent1: The mannerist painting stood out with its exaggerated features and vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: Her mannerist writing style was easily recognizable due to its elaborate descriptions.
meanings.sent3: The mannerist building seemed to defy gravity with its intricate design.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a mannerist paradise, filled with carefully sculpted bushes and flowers.
meanings.sent5: His mannerist fashion sense always included bold patterns and bright accessories.
